sentences.en: The curtains and the bedspread were chocolate velvet.
sentences.cn: 窗帘和床罩是深褐色的天鹅绒。

sentences.en: Your bedspread. Whatever you want to call it.
sentences.cn: 你的床单，随便你怎么叫。

sentences.en: Forget the past, he told himself, letting the photograph fall to the blue bedspread.
sentences.cn: 他告诉自己，忘记过去，将照片压在了床单下面。
